name: Glass Wings
description:
Glass Wings is a fast paced third-person parkour platformer. Vault, jump, roll, and slide your way through the beautiful minimalist metropolis to hone your skills. Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate freerunner?

TRAVERSAL

Utilize a variety of movements to quickly traverse a thrilling environment.

FLOW

Carefully crafted linear levels ensure you never have to break your parkour flow.

STUNNING PLAYGROUNDS

Inspired by classic games of the genre, Glass Wings features a simplified cityscape designed specifically for freerunning.

MORE TO COME

Glass Wings is a short 20 minute proof of concept parkour experience designed to gather player feedback and funding for Glass Wings 2.0. As a solo developer, your support and feedback is of great value, and essential to improving present systems for the next iteration of Glass Wings. Thank you for playing, and being apart of my journey!
